Project:

Investment Operation Support

	Team Lead



PROJECT DESCRIPTION: 
In my current project am working as Technical Lead leading the Investment Operation team from India having 7 team members. We will be monitoring and supporting the different asset classes like Real estate, PAM, Derivatives, Credit Risk etc. We will be doing various project work and implementing the Batch engineering CI ideas.
ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: 
· Distribute work among team members as per bandwidth and making sure of having 100% delivery for every target implementation.
· Understanding and gathering the requirement from onshore BSA then creating the Informatica Jobs as per the business requirement.
· Working on Batch engineering where we need to work on stability, Performance Tuning and System up time as well as reduce the SLA breach time.
· Working on implementing the CI ideas to meet the target for the whole team in terms of saving dollars which is also major part in Sunlife Organization.
· Working on New enhancement and CR for different asset classes and then go through the whole development cycle.
· Working on Jira Automation where Ticket will be created automatically whenever any production abend happened.
· 24x7 Production support
· Upgrading the Informatica Powercenter to latest version from 10.1.1 to 10.2.0


	Client   :
Project:
	XL Catlin ,USA
US Sparta T&M Project

	Role     :
	DBA/Architect





PROJECT DESCRIPTION: 
In this project we had supported front end application of XL Catlin which was using dot net at the front end and Informatica as an ETL tool for back end. Business users upload file from front end which was processed by ETL team and generated dashboard/Stats report for running quarterly reports which was used by users. Also as in database side we did migration to the latest version of SQL server.
ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: 
· Take care of the entire environment residing on different servers which includes tracking of database changes, cleanup activities and space issues on different data drives. 
· Performance and optimization of the queries which help users to work on Adhoc queries on the databases efficiently. 
· Used the red gate tool in SQL server to keep track of all schema changes while migrating to higher environment.
·  Created partition and file groups on the databases for better performance of large tables which had records in billions. 
· Analyzed the frag/defrag of the indexes and how to correct in order to optimize the data loading parts.
· Shrinking of the databases and data files when lots of deletion and update was done on the databases leading to the defragmentation.
· Created few SSIS packages for the business which will save the reports to the 



	Client   :
Project:
	CHUBB 
Claim Feed Replacement Phase 2

	Role     :
	Senior Developer





Project Overview with Responsibilities:
In this project we are migrating the Main Frame code to SSIS packages. This has mainly claim related data which we migrating according to business rules.
As a part of responsibilities we had to create the SSIS packages as per the business requirement. We had to design the package in such a way so that it adhere the all standards and include the optimization measures.



	Client   :
Project:
	Maxlife Insurance
EDW production Support

	Role     :
	Senior Developer





Project Overview with Responsibilities:
MaxlifeInsurance is the leading Insurance Company in India.The main aim of the Project is to support the IIW model that was implemented by the IBM Team. This project gives the brief idea regarding how the data warehousing implemented in an organization and also the importance of the IIW model for insurance organization.
As part of responsibilities we had to gather the requirement from BSA and implement the same in BODS jobs. We had to analyze and monitor the scheduling jobs using Centralized monitoring tool. We had to make sure that all our BO reports was showing correct figures and it was matching with the source reports and Business data. We had to understand and developed code as per the data warehousing standards and used various schema like SCD TYPE 1, 2. I have also involved in the Migration project where we would be migrating from BODS to Informatica.
